titles.title: A bill to reinstate and make permanent the disregard of non-profit organizations' in-kind assistance to SSI and AFDC recipients.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Senate Committee on Finance discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.3545.

bill.summary: 10/20/1987--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) Amends the Deficit Reduction Act of 1984 to permanently disregard in-kind assistance provided by nonprofit organizations to recipients of benefits under title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) or part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act in determining the need or eligibility of such recipients for programs benefits.
